attributes.action: Introduce a law whereby the name of a divorced partner no longer living in a council house has their name automatically removed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So that the remaining partner can move on with their life and no longer be under threat from the ex-spouse being entitled to move back in and/or taking possessions that are no longer theirs.  As it stands, anyone no longer living in a council property is entitled to a key to the property and has the right to keep their name on the tenancy book FOR LIFE, unless they voluntarily remove it by way of written permission.
